mariannaapi.github.io

+++

People widget.

widget = “people” # See https://sourcethemes.com/academic/docs/page-builder/ headless = true # This file represents a page section. active = false # Activate this widget? true/false weight = 68 # Order that this section will appear.

title = “People” subtitle = “”

List user groups to display.

Edit each user’s user_groups to add them to one or more of these groups.

user_groups = [“Principal Investigators”, “Researchers”, “Grad Students”, “Administration”, “Visitors”, “Alumni”] +++
